answer: Cosentyx reported net sales of USD 1,596 million for Q4 2024, representing a +22% increase from Q4 2023 (or +24% constant currency change). For the full year 2024, the report states immunology segment sales grew US$1,620 million, leading to 152% revenue contribution to immunology accelerated to 24% year-over-year, representing a reported +72.6% compared to the full year 2023 immuno segment revenue, or a constant currency +99.5% change.
